title: job_spec_v1
$comment: JobSpec is orchestrator input (deterministic). It is not a business contract; it wires existing v1 contracts into an auditable workflow. Policy assets remain read-only; job_spec must not inline/override policy content.

extensions.description: Forward-compatible extension area. Must not be used to override governance/policies.

snapshot_id.description: Data snapshot id used by the compiler availability check / runner.

policy_bundle_path.description: Path to a policy_bundle_v1.yaml (read-only). Typically a repo-relative path such as 'policies/policy_bundle_v1.yaml'.

blueprint.description: Blueprint v1 JSON object (validated separately in API; kept here for deterministic job_id and review).
